Discover the charming Alsatian towns of Strasbourg and Riquewihr, where French and German cultures intertwine. Step back in time in Cochem and Bernkastel, medieval towns nestled beneath ancient castles. In Trier, explore impressive Roman ruins, while in Koblenz, stand at the historic meeting point of two great rivers. Marvel at Mannheim’s grand Baroque Palace and soak in the beauty of colorful canals, glistening lakes, and Alpine vistas. From majestic fortresses to world-class wines, this cruise is a magical journey through Europe’s past and present. Highlights Canal Cruise in Amsterdam Glide through Amsterdam’s iconic canals on a scenic cruise that offers a unique view of the city’s historic charm and vibrant atmosphere. Cologne Walking Tour & Kölsch Tasting Explore the stunning Gothic architecture of Cologne, including its world-famous cathedral, then sample Kölsch beer in the city where it originated. Reichsburg Castle & Cochem Walking Tour Step into a fairytale at the hilltop Reichsburg Castle and wander the cobbled streets of Cochem, one of the Moselle’s most picturesque towns. Scenic Cruising Through the Rhine Gorge Marvel at the legendary castles and dramatic cliffs of the Rhine Gorge, a UNESCO World Heritage site rich in myth and beauty. Strasbourg – “The Gem of the Alsace” Discover Strasbourg’s unique blend of French and German influences, from its charming half-timbered houses to its majestic Gothic cathedral.
